title: The Morning spider (TEFC)
creator_credit: Black & White Colour Film Company, Mark O'Connor and Claude Chagrin
brief_description: Presents, without narration, a humorous children’s tale in mime, which depicts the life of a hard-working, but often inept morning spider. Cast: Julian Chagrin.
creator_credit_for_label: Black & White Colour Film Company, Mark O’Connor and Claude Chagrin
